articles.title: Canada's Brad Gushue snaps 2-game skid with crucial win over U.S. in men's Olympic curling - CBC.ca
articles.description: Brad Gushue and Canada bounced back in a major way with a 10-5 win over defending Olympic gold medallist John Shuster and his American team in the men’s curling round robin at the Beijing Games on Sunday morning.
